Today we’re celebrating 3 years of existence in the hosting space 🥰 As a treat, we’re bringing you our special discounted **Bdayspecial-1** and **Bdayspecial-2** plans. You can save upto 75% on these rare high-spec SSD VPS. Limited stocks!

Also, if you haven’t already, you can still enter our [CloudCone Turns 3 giveaway](https://www.lowendtalk.com/discussion/165637/we-are-turning-3-this-month-stand-a-chance-to-win-a-free-server-or-cpanel-included-for-life-%F0%9F%A5%B3#latest "CloudCone Turns 3 giveaway") and stand the chance to win FREE cloud servers or Free cPanel.

Looking back on 2019, we introduced a list of new products, features and improvements to our platform:
* **We launched our mobile app** with instant support, easy access to your server dashboard, billing related activities, push notifications, and boot, reboot and shutdown functionalities.
* **We introduced the one click applications** feature that allows you to deploy important applications on your server for free in just one click.
* **We implemented our true private cloud solution** that allows your expanding business to run in a dedicated environment that is both secure and scalable to your heart’s content.
* **We acquired our cPanel verified partnership** that also granted an opportunity for the skilled cloud engineers on our team to certify as cPanel admins. 
 
This year we’re planning to introduce more products and features including the Version 2 of our API that allows customers to control their server within their software or application. Hope you’d look forward to it! 

Together with an international team of in-house Support and DevOps Engineers, we provide 24/7 Live Priority Support for all our clients. As always, we listen to all of the feedback provided and continuously attempt to improve our services to match our overall customer demands better.
